scripts.deploy:dev: NODE_ENV=development npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: NODE_ENV=testnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:prod: NODE_ENV=production npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.checkBalance:dev: NODE_ENV=development npx hardhat run scripts/checkBalance.js --network localhost
scripts.checkBalance:testnet: NODE_ENV=testnet npx hardhat run scripts/checkBalance.js --network monad
scripts.checkBalance:prod: NODE_ENV=production npx hardhat run scripts/checkBalance.js --network mainnet
